HealthcareProvider.name: HealthcareProvider
HealthcareProvider.description: Represents business-level details about the healthcare organization or the practitioner.

AccountId.description: Account that this healthcare provider is associated with. This field is a relationship field.

Classification.description: Specifies the classification of the healthcare provider. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later when Site Management is enabled.

DoesParticipateInRsrchStudy.description: Indicates whether the healthcare provider participates in research studies (true) or not (false). This field is available in API version 63.0 and later when Site Management is enabled.

DoesUseElecDataCapture.description: Indicates whether the healthcare provider uses Electronic Data Capture (EDC) system (true) or not (false). This field is available in API version 62.0 and later when Site Management is enabled.

EffectiveFrom.description: Specifies the date from which the provider becomes effective.

EffectiveTo.description: Specifies the date from which the provider is no longer effective.

EhrSystem.description: Name of the EHR system used at this facility or organization.

InitialStartDate.description: Specifies the date when the facility first became operational or the practitioner first began practicing.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last referenced a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record. This field is a polymorphic relationship field.

PractitionerId.description: The practitioner that this healthcare provider record is associated with. This field is a relationship field.

ProviderClass.description: The class of facility, such as an IPA, medical group, or solo practitioner.

ProviderPhotoId.description: The Content Document file that is a photo of the Healthcare Provider. This field is a relationship field.

ProviderType.description: Type of provider or facility. For example, pharmacist or ambulatory care facility.

RelatedUserId.description: The User record that relates to the Healthcare Provider record. This field is a relationship field.

SourceSystem.description: The system from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of the system from which the record was sourced. This field is unique within your organization

TotalLicensedBeds.description: Total number of licensed beds at this facility, if applicable.
